page_title.home: CoCoMusic Official Website - Multi-platform Aggregated Music Player
page_title.download: Download CoCoMusic - Multi-platform Aggregated Music Player
page_title.enterprise: CoCoMusic Pro - Personal Advanced Music Experience

page_description.home: CoCoMusic is a cross-platform aggregated music player supporting Windows, macOS and Linux. It integrates songs and playlists from platforms like NetEase Cloud Music and QQ Music, providing smooth and stable playback.
page_description.download: Download the CoCoMusic client for Windows, macOS and Linux. Aggregates mainstream music platforms with a simple, easy-to-use experience.
page_description.enterprise: CoCoMusic Pro offers advanced features for personal users, including high-performance audio, theme customization, desktop lyrics, backup and sync — taking your music experience to the next level.

banner.powerful_ai_assistant: Your high-quality multi-platform aggregated music player
banner.multi_provider_client: Aggregated playback across multiple music platforms
banner.multi_provider_description: Integrates content from NetEase Cloud Music, QQ Music, etc., with unified favorites and playlists.
banner.local_storage_description: Playback history, favorites and settings are stored locally, with optional cloud sync.
banner.your_personal_assistant: A player that understands you better
banner.knowledge_base_description: Import local files and online playlists to quickly build your personal music library.

features.title: Main Features
features.description: This is only a partial feature list. Try more in the client, or see the <1>official documentation</1>.

conversation.title: Multi-platform Aggregated Playback
conversation.description: Unified search and playback of songs and playlists from NetEase Cloud Music, QQ Music, etc.

drawing.title: Lyrics & Audio Effects
drawing.description: Supports word-by-word/scrolling lyrics and provides equalizer and audio enhancements.

translation.title: Playlist Management
translation.description: Create, edit, import/export playlists, sync favorites across platforms.

assistants.title: Themes & Appearance
assistants.description: Rich themes and appearance settings, light/dark modes and customizable styles.

knowledge_base.title: Search & Recommendations
knowledge_base.description: Fast search, charts and personalized recommendations to discover more music.

backup.title: Backup & Sync
backup.description: Local backup and cloud sync, switch devices without worry.

intro.title: Project Introduction
intro.description: CoCoMusic is a multi-platform aggregated music player supporting Windows, macOS and Linux. We are committed to delivering a lightweight, stable and user-friendly music experience.

goal.title: Goals of CoCoMusic
goal.description: CoCoMusic lets you focus on listening and managing your music library, rather than being bothered by complex setup. Simply configure the music source or log in to a platform to start listening. We provide detailed documentation and an active community to help you get started quickly.

contribution.title: I want to contribute — what can I do?
contribution.description: If you like our project, welcome to star us on <1>Github</1> to support us. If you are experienced, you can become a contributor. You can also help edit documentation to share your experience or answer questions in the community. If you have ideas or suggestions, contact us via GitHub Issues or in the official community.

community.title: Join Our Community
community.wechat_scan_prompt: Scan to join the QQ group

footer.description: CoCoMusic is a multi-platform aggregated music player. We are committed to enabling more people to enjoy the fun of music.

contact_us.title: Contact Us
contact_us.contact_info: If you have usage issues, please first check the docs or ask in the community <0/> or email <1>markcxx798@163.com</1>

providers.title: CoCoMusic includes multiple music platforms
providers.subtitle: Also supports connecting to other sources compatible with the API format

recommend.title: For You
recommend.description: Based on your favorites and listening history, intelligently recommends trending and hidden gems to discover fresh music right from the homepage.

playlist.title: Playlist View
playlist.description: Clear grouping and labels, supports import/export, cross-platform synced favorites and custom sorting.

lyrics_visual.title: Lyrics Page
lyrics_visual.description: Word-by-word highlighting and scrolling lyrics, with real-time spectrum visuals for immersive audio-visual experience.

recommend_dark.title: Dark Theme
recommend_dark.description: Eye-friendly night mode; curated recommendations remain elegant and readable in dark.

desktop_lyrics.title: Desktop Lyrics
desktop_lyrics.description: Floating window shows current lyrics with adjustable size and transparency; supports always-on-top and multi-monitor.

download_page.hero_subtitle: All platforms supported, immersive music experience

features.title: Why Choose CoCoMusic
features.subtitle: More than a player — your music management center

privacy.title: Privacy First
privacy.desc: Local data storage, usable without login — your listening history is yours

performance.title: Extreme Performance
performance.desc: Built with Rust and React, millisecond startup with very low memory usage

extensions.title: Plugin Ecosystem
extensions.desc: Supports custom sources and extensions — unlimited possibilities

ui.title: Beautiful UI
ui.desc: Immersive lyrics, spectrum visualization, adaptive theme colors

download_page.version_error: Failed to fetch version info, temporarily use the cloud link
download_page.activation_tip: Tip: To prevent abuse, this software uses an activation code mechanism. It is completely free and permanent after activation. Please join the official group to get the code.

intel_version.title: CoCoMusic High-Performance Audio Edition
intel_version.subtitle: A high-performance music playback solution optimized for modern hardware
intel_version.description: Leverages hardware acceleration and audio optimization to deliver lower latency and more stable playback

local_model.title: Hardware-accelerated Playback
local_model.description: Optimized for modern CPUs, low latency and stable playback

long_context.title: Ultra-long Play Queue
long_context.description: Supports large playlists and long sessions without interruption

knowledge_base.title: Local Music Library Building
knowledge_base.description: Manage local music files and organize covers/tags

protocol_extension.title: Audio Protocol Extensions
protocol_extension.description: Compatible with more audio formats and output devices

private_deployment.title: Themes & Appearance
